rules.core_growth: Trim if ≤ -12% vs 5d close or ≥ +12% intraday
rules.nvda: Fail-safe only: ≤ -12% intraday or close < LOW5
rules.moonshots: Warn if ≤ -15% intraday & vol ≥1.5x or ≤ -25% vs 5d

rules.nvda: Tranche 1 (25%) if close < LOW5 or intraday ≤ -6% w/ vol↑; Tranche 2 (10-15%) if close < DMA50
rules.restwerte: No DCA, alert only on hard breaks

rules.pnl: Risk alert if ≤ -2.5% family or ≤ -3.5% any depot
